name: Tomorrow's Bizarre Adventure
description: Tomorrow's Bizarre Adventure is a Powered by the Apocalypse TTRPG based on the hit manga & anime series, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. In it, player take control of Characters and work with/against the Narrator  that's controlled by another player in order to craft stories and create moments much like the original release. Take control of one of four Fighting Styles: Stand User, Hamon User, Spin User, and Mundane, as you fight and outwit your way through a bizarre world.
